title: Bike Saddle Box program lets you demo any saddle on your own bike
content:
Sick of spending hours picking out a saddle that just ends up hurting your back or chafing your bits anyway? Bike Fit Box’s new Bike Saddle Box feature is the first-of-its-kind program, letting you choose a few saddles to try, at home, on your own bike. And it’s all relatively risk-free.
